items.text: in the air and evades mid-off. Advances down the ground and tries to get to the pitch alright but it's slower in pace and he skews it in the air off the toe-end. Mid-off runs back and dives in front but this was always going to hard to judge and he watches the ball land in front of him

items.text: good take by Dickwella. Anamul has had his share of chances but he still backs himself to hook this short ball despite the complete lack of room. Bounces more than to his liking and gets a top-edge that is taken sharply by Dickwella leaping up and to his left. Stretches out full length and takes it with both hands
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Anamul Haque, OUT

items.postText: Right then. Sri Lanka have finally had a breakthrough after a hard-fought passage. I'm off for a bit. Over to Deiva.
